name: SLIPSTAR
description:
>> ludum dare page <<

Choose one of four ace pilots and race to perfect your time.

[ < ] [ > ] .................... Steer
[ SPACE ] ................. Thrust
[ F ] ........................... Fullscreen
[ ESC ] ...................... Pause
[ BACKSPACE ] ....... Leave race
[ Q ] .......................... Quit

A game by:

- Kira Boom
- Nicolas Munoz
- Peter Rockwell
- Cody Walker

made for ludum dare 37 in 72 hours.
